Participants one screening/enrollment visit , two in-person follow visit , one telephone follow contact . Subjects enrol total 84 day ( three month ) . Participants assign treatment group screening/enrollment visit . Her first follow visit occur 22-28 day enrollment . Participants choose : - Continue use assign treatment medication - Discontinue use assign treatment medication , use open-label combined oral contraceptive pill - Discontinue use assign treatment medication , decline use open-label combined oral contraceptive pill - Discontinue use ETG implant . Participants choose continue use ETG implant follow telephone contact 50-56 day enrollment visit . A final in-person visit occur 78-84 day enrollment .
